item.description:
Saturday, September 8, 2007
The Middle East Downstairs

HOODOO GURUS (fr. Australia)
The Downbeat 5

18+

$15adv/$17dos

8 pm doors

Ticketmaster event website:

http://www.ticketmast...

Doors open at 8pm, not sure what time the HGs are on. Lets meet at the bar on the street level at the entrance to the club. Enter the door on the Brookline Ave side of the building and turn left. There is a small bar area as part of the resturant, I'll be there from 8pm onwards. If you come later on we will probably be downstairs watching the bands. If you have troubles finding the group, call me on 617 312 2236. Cheers

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Live Aussie music: Hoodoo Gurus
